title: American Airlines Center - Wikipedia
snippet: American Airlines Center (AAC) is a multi-purpose indoor arena located in the Victory Park neighborhood in downtown Dallas, Texas. The arena serves as the home of the Dallas Stars of the National Hockey League and Dallas Mavericks of the National Basketball Association.

title: Where Do The Dallas Mavericks Play?

title: American Airlines Center
snippet: The American Airlines Center is the Dallas area's Premier Sports and Entertainment arena, and home to the NHL's Dallas Stars and NBA's Dallas Mavericks.

title: Dallas Mavericks - Wikipedia
snippet: The Mavericks compete in the National Basketball Association (NBA) as a member of the Southwest Division of the Western Conference. The team plays its home games at American Airlines Center, which it shares with the National Hockey League's ...

title: American Airlines Center
snippet: Home Court Advantage: The Mavericks play their home games at the American Airlines Center, which is located in the heart of downtown Dallas. The arena is known for its energetic crowds and distinctive Texas-style decor.
